name: Paper Can't Fly
description:
FLY

Fly, Build & Share! Take control of a paper plane and soar through a variety of levels that will challenge your skills and reflexes. The gameplay is easy to pick up, but difficult to master - so get ready to put your skills to the test!


BUILD

But the fun doesn't stop there! With the included level editor, you can unleash your creativity by building your own levels and experimenting with a wide variety of tiles and objects to design the ultimate paper plane challenge. The sky is the limit!


SHARE

And if that's not enough, you can also share your levels with the world! Challenge others to beat your creations or play community-made levels yourself. There's always something new to discover and conquer in this exciting and endlessly creative game!
